Uses of Class
ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.CharToken

  • Packages that use Grammar.CharToken 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.

    • Uses of Grammar.CharToken in ml.alternet.parser

      Subclasses of Grammar.CharToken in ml.alternet.parser 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Grammar.CharToken.Composed
      A token made of a several char ranges.
      static class  Grammar.CharToken.Single
      A token made of a single char range.
      Fields in ml.alternet.parser declared as Grammar.CharToken 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Grammar.CharToken Grammar.$any
      The char token for any Unicode codepoint.
      static Grammar.CharToken Grammar.$empty
      The char token that matches nothing.
